Tasks.Task Description: Regularly review and update security policies related to Azure Bastion to ensure they align with organizational security standards and best practices.
Continuously monitor Azure Bastion logs for any unauthorized access attempts or anomalies. Utilize Azure Monitor and Log Analytics for effective log management.
Configure and maintain Network Security Groups (NSGs) to restrict access to Azure Bastion and ensure only authorized traffic is allowed.
Perform regular security audits of Azure Bastion configurations and access controls to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
Ensure that Azure Bastion is updated to the latest version to benefit from security patches and new features. Schedule updates during maintenance windows to minimize impact.
Regularly back up the configuration settings of Azure Bastion to ensure quick recovery in case of misconfiguration or failure.
Regularly review user access permissions to Azure Bastion to ensure that only authorized users have access and that permissions are appropriate.
Develop and maintain an incident response plan specific to Azure Bastion to address potential security incidents effectively.
Schedule and conduct penetration testing on Azure Bastion to identify vulnerabilities and ensure the service is secure against potential threats.
Ensure that the operations team participates in regular security training to stay updated on best practices and emerging threats related to Azure Bastion.
